metadata.description: Specifies a project name that is used to generate the Event Hub name and the Namespace name.
Specifies the Azure location for all resources.
The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

content.query:
requests
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp,1s), cloud_RoleName, resultCode
| where cloud_RoleName in ({Role}) or "all_placeholder" == {Role} 
| project timestamp, Count, Role = strcat(cloud_RoleName, " ", resultCode)
content.title: Requests/s

content.query:
let data = requests
| where timestamp {TimeRange};
data
| summarize Users = dcount(user_Id), CountFailed = countif(success == false), Count = count() by name, appName, cloud_RoleName
| where cloud_RoleName in ({Role}) or "all_placeholder" == {Role}
| project App = appName, Role = cloud_RoleName, Operation = name, ['Count (Failed)'] = CountFailed, Count, ['Success %'] = round(100.0 * (Count - CountFailed) / Count, 2), Users
| union (data
    | summarize Users = dcount(user_Id), CountFailed = countif(success == false), Count = count()
    | project App = 'ðŸ”¸ All Apps', Role = 'ðŸ”¸ All Roles',  Operation = 'ðŸ”¸ All operations', Users, ['Count (Failed)'] = CountFailed, Count, ['Success %'] = round(100.0 * (Count - CountFailed) / Count, 2))
| order by ['Count (Failed)'] desc
content.title: Request Details

secrets.name: [variables('EHConnectionStringSecretName')]
secrets.value: [listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces/eventhubs/authorizationRules', split(format('{0}/{1}/{2}', parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), parameters('eventHubName'), parameters('eventHubAuthRuleName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}/{2}', parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), parameters('eventHubName'), parameters('eventHubAuthRuleName')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/{1}/{2}', parameters('eventHubNamespaceName'), parameters('eventHubName'), parameters('eventHubAuthRuleName')), '/')[2]), '2022-01-01-preview').primaryConnectionString]
